notice.text: Changing any settings requires a restart of obsidian.

settings.name: Global task filter
settings.description: The global filter will be applied to all checklist items.
settings.placeholder: Enter a tag like #task here to limit queries to only tasks with this tag.

notice.text:
The global filter will be applied to all checklist items to filter out 'non-task' checklist items.
 A checklist item must include the specified string in its description in order to be considered a task.
 For example, if you set the global filter to '#task', the Tasks plugin will only handle checklist items tagged with '#task'.
 Other checklist items will remain normal checklist items and not appear in queries or get a done date set.
 Leave empty if you want all checklist items from your vault to be tasks managed by this plugin.

settings.name: Remove global filter from description
settings.description: Enabling this removes the string that you set as global filter from the task description when displaying a task.

settings.name: Set done date on every completed task
settings.description: Enabling this will add a timestamp âœ… YYYY-MM-DD at the end when a task is toggled to done.

settings.name: Append global filter
settings.description: When this is enabled the global filter if specified will be appended to the task by default. Existing tasks will be updated on any edits.
